verse.name: c1
v1a
verse.lines:
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee,
E'en though it be a cross

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
That raiseth me!
Still all my song shall be,

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Though like the wanderer,
The sun gone down,
Darkness be over me,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
My rest a stone;
Yet in my dreams I'd be,

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
In mercy given;
Angels to beckon me,

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Then, with my waking thoughts
Bright with Thy praise,
Out of my stony griefs

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Bethel I'll raise,
So by my woes to be,

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Or if, on joyful wing
Cleaving the sky,
Sun, moon, and stars forgot,

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
Upward I fly,
Still all my song shall be,
